a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Per capita energy from fossil fuels, nuclear and renewables, 1965 to
Measured in kilowatt-hours of primary energy consumption per person, using the substitution method.
Data source: Energy Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2024); Population based on various sources (2023)
